resources.string: A Simple Grin wallet for your enjoyment

We're so glad you are a believer of Grin. Electronic transactions for all. Without censorship or restrictions.

To create a wallet, you will generate a secret seed and a password. They will let you interact with the Grin blockchain. 

Note we only temporarily store your wallet information, please make sure to back up your wallet information.

A recovery phrase is a series of 15 easy to remember words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet.\n\nPlease have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down. Screenshots or digitally saved phrases are easier to be hacked.
Please carefully write down the following words in the right order.
